open.description: If true, the component is shown.
open.description_zh: 如果为 true，则显示组件。

aria-describedby.description: The id(s) of the element(s) that describe the dialog.
aria-describedby.description_zh: 描述对话框的元素的 ID。

aria-labelledby.description: The id(s) of the element(s) that label the dialog.
aria-labelledby.description_zh: 标记对话框的元素的 ID。

BackdropComponent.description: A backdrop component. This prop enables custom backdrop rendering.Deprecated - Use slots.backdrop instead. While this prop currently works, it will be removed in the next major version.
BackdropComponent.description_zh: 背景组件。此道具支持自定义背景渲染。已弃用 - 请改用 slots.backdrop。虽然这个道具目前有效，但它将在下一个主要版本中被删除。

children.description: Dialog children, usually the included sub-components.
children.description_zh: 对话框子组件，通常是包含的子组件。

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

disableEscapeKeyDown.description: If true, hitting escape will not fire the onClose callback.
disableEscapeKeyDown.description_zh: 如果为 true，则按 escape 不会触发 onClose 回调。

fullScreen.description: If true, the dialog is full-screen.
fullScreen.description_zh: 如果为 true，则对话框为全屏。

fullWidth.description: If true, the dialog stretches to maxWidth.Notice that the dialog width grow is limited by the default margin.
fullWidth.description_zh: 如果为 true，则对话框将拉伸到 maxWidth。请注意，对话框宽度增长受默认边距的限制。

maxWidth.description: Determine the max-width of the dialog. The dialog width grows with the size of the screen. Set to false to disable maxWidth.
maxWidth.description_zh: 确定对话框的最大宽度。对话框宽度随着屏幕大小的增加而增长。设置为 false 可禁用 maxWidth。
maxWidth.type: xs| sm| md| lg| xl| false| string

onBackdropClick.description: Callback fired when the backdrop is clicked.Deprecated - Use the onClose prop with the reason argument to handle the backdropClick events.
onBackdropClick.description_zh: 单击背景时触发回调。已弃用 - 使用带有 reason 参数的 onClose 属性来处理 backdropClick 事件。

onClose.description: Callback fired when the component requests to be closed.Signature:function(event: object, reason: string) => voidevent The event source of the callback.reason Can be: "escapeKeyDown", "backdropClick".
onClose.description_zh: 当组件请求关闭时触发回调。Signature：function（event： object， reason： string） => voidevent callback.reason 的事件源可以是：“escapeKeyDown”、“backdropClick”。

PaperComponent.description: The component used to render the body of the dialog.
PaperComponent.description_zh: 用于呈现对话框正文的组件。

PaperProps.description: Props applied to the Paper element.
PaperProps.description_zh: 应用于 Paper 元素的道具。

scroll.description: Determine the container for scrolling the dialog.
scroll.description_zh: 确定用于滚动对话框的容器。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。

TransitionComponent.description: The component used for the transition. Follow this guide to learn more about the requirements for this component.
TransitionComponent.description_zh: 用于过渡的组件。按照本指南了解有关此组件要求的详细信息。

transitionDuration.description: The duration for the transition, in milliseconds. You may specify a single timeout for all transitions, or individually with an object.
transitionDuration.description_zh: 转换的持续时间，以毫秒为单位。您可以为所有过渡指定单个超时，也可以单独指定一个对象超时。
transitionDuration.type: number| { appear?: number, enter?: number, exit?: number }

TransitionProps.description: Props applied to the transition element. By default, the element is based on this Transition component.
TransitionProps.description_zh: 应用于过渡元素的道具。默认情况下，该元素基于此 Transition 组件。

events.name: onBackdropClick
events.description: Callback fired when the backdrop is clicked.Deprecated - Use the  prop with the reason argument to handle the backdropClick events.
events.description_zh: 单击背景时触发回调。已弃用 - 使用带有 reason 参数的 prop 来处理 backdropClick 事件。

events.name: onClose
events.description: Callback fired when the component requests to be closed.Signature:event The event source of the callback.reason Can be: "escapeKeyDown", "backdropClick".
events.description_zh: 当组件请求关闭时触发回调。Signature：event callback.reason 的事件源可以是：“escapeKeyDown”、“backdropClick”。
